ya10.1.2:2.1.pli: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhundriyaṃ. Cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhu ceva cakkhundriyañca.

ya10.1.2:404.1.pli: Yo kāyo indriyaṃ so kāyo ceva indriyañca. Avaseso kāyo na indriyā.

ya10.1.2:406.1.pli: Kāyindriyaṃ indriyañceva kāyindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na kāyindriyaṃ.

ya10.1.2:432.1.pli: Yā upekkhā indriyaṃ sā upekkhā ceva indriyañca. Avasesā upekkhā na indriyaṃ.

ya10.1.2:449.1.pli: Paññindriyaṃ indriyañceva paññindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na paññindriyaṃ.

ya10.1.2:455.1.pli: Aññindriyaṃ indriyañceva aññindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na aññindriyaṃ.

ya10.1.2:458.1.pli: Aññātāvindriyaṃ indriyañceva aññātāvindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na aññātāvindriyaṃ.

ya10.1.2:460.1.pli: Cakkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na cakkhu, indriyā. Cakkhuñca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:463.1.pli: Sotaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na sotaṃ, indriyā. Sotañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva sotaṃ na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:466.1.pli: Ghānaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na ghānaṃ, indriyā. Ghānañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva ghānaṃ na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:469.1.pli: Jivhaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na jivhā, indriyā. Jivhañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva jivhā na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:474.1.pli: Manaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na mano, indriyā. Manañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva mano na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:477.1.pli: Itthiṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na itthī, indriyā. Itthiñca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva itthī na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:480.1.pli: Purisaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na puriso, indriyā. Purisañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva puriso na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:483.1.pli: Jīvitaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na jīvitaṃ, indriyā. Jīvitañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva jīvitaṃ na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:486.1.pli: Sukhaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na sukhaṃ, indriyā. Sukhañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva sukhaṃ na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:489.1.pli: Dukkhaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na dukkhaṃ, indriyā. Dukkhañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva dukkhaṃ na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:492.1.pli: Somanassaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na somanassaṃ, indriyā. Somanassañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva somanassaṃ na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:495.1.pli: Domanassaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na domanassaṃ, indriyā. Domanassañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva domanassaṃ na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:498.1.pli: Upekkhaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na upekkhā, indriyā. Upekkhañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva upekkhā na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:501.1.pli: Saddhaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na saddhā, indriyā. Saddhañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva saddhā na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:504.1.pli: Vīriyaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na vīriyaṃ, indriyā. Vīriyañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva vīriyaṃ na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:507.1.pli: Satiṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na sati, indriyā. Satiñca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva sati na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:510.1.pli: Samādhiṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na samādhi, indriyā. Samādhiñca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva samādhi na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:513.1.pli: Paññaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na paññā, indriyā. Paññañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva paññā na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:516.1.pli: Anaññātaññassāmītiṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na anaññātaññassāmīti, indriyā. Anaññātaññassāmītiñca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva anaññātaññassāmīti na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:519.1.pli: Aññaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na aññaṃ, indriyā. Aññañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva aññaṃ na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:526.1.pli: Sotindriyaṃ indriyañceva sotindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na sotindriyaṃ.

ya10.1.2:588.1.pli: Yaṃ sotaṃ indriyaṃ taṃ sotañceva indriyañca. Avasesaṃ sotaṃ na indriyaṃ.

ya10.1.2:649.1.pli: Yā upekkhā indriyaṃ sā upekkhā ceva indriyañca. Avasesā upekkhā na indriyaṃ.

ya10.1.2:673.1.pli: Cakkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na cakkhu, indriyā. Cakkhuñca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca indriyā.

ya10.1.2:700.1.pli: Na mano na indriyanti? Manaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na mano, indriyā. Manañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva mano na ca indriyā.
